product_name: prAna Talon Mock Neck Top - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The prAna Talon Mock Neck top provides just the right lightweight coverage to keep you comfortable during the warm-up portion of your workout. Polyester fabric combines moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance with 4-way stretch. Mesh back provides high ventilation, and flatlock seams reduce chafing and irritation. Zipper allows easy ventilation. prAna Talon Mock Neck top features an athletic fit that skims the body without being too tight. Closeout.
short_description: The prAna Talon Mock Neck top provides just the right lightweight coverage to keep you comfortable during the warm-up portion of your workout.
